greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime factor of n - number of prime factors of n with multiplicity.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with(numtheory); A091371:=n->`if`(n=1,1,min(op(factorset(n)))-bigomega(n)); seq(A091371(k), k=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 27 2013
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 04 2004
ext: Definition clarified by _Harvey P. Dale_, May 25 2012
